text: Getting counseling on a television reality show isn't everyone's idea of therapy. But Kendra Wilkinson says she wished she could have had more time on WEtv's Marriage Boot Camp : Family Edition with her estranged mother Patti.'It's so easy to look around and see the cameras and be like,'This is a TV show, a train wreck TV show that I'm a part of. This ain't therapy,'and then it proves you wrong,'Hugh Hefner's ex told E! News.'You're forced to believe in it,'the 31 - year - old former Playmate explained.'You're forced to give because you're so drained. If you're here just do it.'On camera counseling : Kendra
